Package com.github.siroshun09.event4j.bus

Interface EventBus

All Known Implementing Classes:
SimpleEventBus
public interface EventBus
An interface that manages listeners of events and dispatches events.

    • getHandlerList

      @NotNull <T extends Event> @NotNull HandlerList<T> getHandlerList​(@NotNull @NotNull Class<T> eventClass)
      Gets the handler list of the event class.

      Only one handler list is created per event class in one event bus instance.

      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of event class
      Parameters:
      eventClass - the event class to get handler list
      Returns:
      the handler list of the event class.

    • unsubscribeAll

      void unsubscribeAll​(@NotNull @NotNull Key key)
      Unsubscribes all listeners subscribed with the specified Key for this event bus instance.
      Parameters:
      key - the key that subscribed listeners

    • callEvent

      @NotNull <T extends Event> T callEvent​(@NotNull T event)
      Dispatches the event to subscribed listeners.

      If an exception is thrown while calling a listener, Listener.handleException(Event, Throwable) is called and then continues to call the other listeners. That is, if a listener throws an exception, the method is processed to complete successfully.

      This method also dispatches to the listener of a higher class from which the event class inherits.

      Example:

      There is SampleEvent1, which extends Event, and then there is SampleEvent2, which extends SampleEvent1.

      Calling this method on SampleEvent2 will invoke the subscribed listeners in the order SampleEvent2 → SampleEvent1 → Event.

      Type Parameters:
      T - the event type
      Parameters:
      event - the event instance
      Returns:
      the given event instance

    • callEventAsync

      @NotNull <E extends Event> @NotNull CompletableFuture<E> callEventAsync​(@NotNull E event)

      Type Parameters:

      the CompletableFuture

    • callEventAsync

      @NotNull <E extends Event> @NotNull CompletableFuture<E> callEventAsync​(@NotNull E event, @NotNull @NotNull Executor executor)
      Calls callEvent(Event) asynchronously.
      Type Parameters:

      the CompletableFuture

    • callEventAsync

      @NotNull <E extends Event> @NotNull CompletableFuture<E> callEventAsync​(@NotNull E event, @NotNull @NotNull Function<Supplier<E>,​CompletableFuture<E>> futureFunction)
      Calls callEvent(Event) asynchronously.

      The Supplier of the input of the Function is () -> callEvent(event), and the event will be called when Supplier.get() is executed.

      In callEventAsync(Event, Executor), the Supplier is used as supplier -> CompletableFuture.supplyAsync(supplier, executor) to create the required Function.

      Type Parameters:
      E - the event type
      Parameters:
      event - the event instance
      futureFunction - the function to create CompletableFuture from the given event instance
      Returns:
      the CompletableFuture
